page.title: 09LOCAL BUSINESSESS & SERVICES
page.content: BILLINGHAY HAS MOST OF THE FACILITIES THAT ANY VILLAGE WOULD WANT.IN THE VILLAGE THERE ARE 4 PUBS AND 2 BANKS.LLOYDS IS OPEN ON TUESDAYS AND THURSDAYS AND MIDLANDS IS OPEN TUESDAYS,THURSDAYS AND FRIDAYS.THERE ARE 2 BUTCHERS SHOPS,2 SHOPS WHICH SELL FISH AND CHIPS, A POST OFFICE WHICH HAS A SMALL SELECTION OF TOYS AS WELL.THERE ARE 3 GARAGES AND 3 HAIRDRESSERS SO YOU HAVE A GOOS CHOICE.WE HAVE DOCTORS,A VET,FIRE STATION AND LOCAL POLICEMAN.THERE ARE 2 SCHOOLS, A PRIMARY AND A SECONDARY.IN BILLINGHAY THERE IS AN IRONMONGERS,A CHEMISTS,A SMALL SWEET SHOP AND A LARGE HAULAGE FIRM.WE HAVE A LARGE PLAYING FIELD,A CO_OP,A GROCERS AND A PET SHOP.THERE IS ALSO A FEED COMPANY WHICH IS A.C.GILBERTS AND THERE IS A SELECTION OF ARABLE AND LIVESTOCK FARMS.
